TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BindingElement extends System.Object

summary.span: 繫結的項目，這些繫結可以建置各種通道型別的通道處理站和通道接聽程式，以用來處理傳出和傳入的訊息。

span.span: The elements of the bindings that build the channel factories and channel listeners for various types of channels that are used to process outgoing and incoming messages.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由繼承自這個抽象基底類別之已排序繫結項目集合所組成的繫結。A binding consists of an ordered set of binding elements that inherit from this abstract base class. 類別繼承自 類別。The class inherits from the class. 如果您只要使用通道模型，則可選擇性地為您的傳輸建立繫結和繫結項目。Creating a binding and binding element for your transport is optional if you are just using the channel model. 只要通道處理站和接聽程式是公開的，您就可以透過它們來執行各種工作。It is possible to do everything you need through the channel factory and listener as long as they are made public. Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) 服務模型會使用處理站模式的繫結來建立通道堆疊。The Windows Communication Foundation (WCF) service model uses a factory pattern where the binding is used to create the channel stack. 如果您想要使用 WCF 服務模型，則需要使用的傳輸繫結項目。If you want to use the WCF service model, then using a transport binding element is required. 將此繫結程序項目放入繫結程序是最好的做法，因為這樣使用者就不需要為您的傳輸建立自己的自訂繫結程序。Placing this binding element into a binding is a good practice because it removes the requirement for users to create their own custom binding for your transport. 最好同時建立繫結和繫結項目，並將通道處理站和接聽程式隱藏在組件中。It is best to create both a binding and binding element, and hide the channel factory and listener inside the assembly. 在傳送端，繫結會用來建置 ，而此處理站會接著建置通道堆疊，並傳回在堆疊中頂端通道的參考。On the sending side, a binding is used to build a , which in turn builds a channel stack and returns a reference to the top channel in the stack. 應用程式可以接著使用這個通道來傳送訊息。The application can then use this channel to send messages. 同樣地，在接收端，繫結會用來建置 ，而此接聽程式會接聽傳入訊息。Similarly, on the receiving side a binding is used to build a , which listens for incoming messages. 會透過建立通道堆疊並將應用程式參考傳遞至頂端通道的方式，來提供訊息給接聽應用程式。The provides messages to the listening application by creating channel stacks and handing the application a reference to the top channel. 應用程式可以接著使用這個通道來接收傳入訊息。The application then uses this channel to receive incoming messages. > [!NOTE] > 如果您要新增加密訊息標頭必須是您必須傳回執行個體，您的需求，從方法時要求。If you are adding message headers that must be encrypted you must return a instance with your requirements from the method when asked for . ## Examples 下列範例顯示如何新增傳輸繫結項目至自訂繫結，並接著建置可以接收傳入訊息的通道接聽程式。The following example shows how to add a transport binding element to a custom binding and then build a channel listener that can accept incoming messages. [!code-csharp[S_UEChannels#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uechannels/cs/servicesnippets.cs#1)] [!code-vb[S_UEChannels#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uechannels/vb/servicesnippets.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果您要在嘗試建置處理站之前，先檢查是否可以針對提供的 `TChannel` 建置 `context` 型別之通道的通道處理站，請使用這個方法。Use this method if you want to check that the channel factory for channels of type `TChannel` can be build for the `context` provided before attempting to build the factory. 或者，請呼叫 來建置通道處理站並攔截產生的例外狀況 (如果無法建置的話)。Alternatively, build the channel factory by calling and catch the exception generated if it cannot be built. ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEChannels#18](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uechannels/cs/clientsnippets.cs#18)]

abstract member Clone : unit -> System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElement

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，傳回繫結項目物件的複本。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a copy of the binding element object.

returns.span: 物件，其為原始物件的深層複製。

span.span: A object that is a deep clone of the original.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作 方法，以傳回繫結項目的深層複製。Implement the method to return a deep clone of your binding element. 傳回複製可讓執行階段支援多個自訂繫結共用自訂繫結項目的情況。Returning a clone enables the runtime to support the case in which multiple custom bindings share a custom binding element. 如果沒有傳回複製，則表示執行階段行為尚未定義。If a clone is not returned, the run-time behavior is undefined. 物件的深層複製會建立物件的複本，以及該物件直接或間接參考之每個物件的複本，A deep clone of an object creates a copy of the object and a copy of everything directly or indirectly referenced by that object. (這也稱為複製整個物件圖形)。相較之下，物件的淺層複製則只是物件的複本。(This is also called copying the entire object graph.) A shallow clone of an object, by contrast, is a copy of the object only. 如果物件包含其他物件的參考，則淺層複製不會建立所參考之物件的複本，而只會複製原始物件的參考。If the object contains references to other objects, the shallow copy does not create copies of the referred objects; instead, it copies only the references to the original objects.

.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance !!T GetProperty<class T>(class System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext context) cil managed
Public MustOverride Function GetProperty(Of T As Class) (context As BindingContext) As T
abstract member GetProperty : System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingContext -> 'T (requires 'T : null)

typeparam.name: T
typeparam.span: 此方法正在查詢的型別物件。

span.span: The typed object for which the method is querying.
The for the binding element.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，從繫結堆疊的適當層次中，傳回要求的型別物件 (如果有的話)。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, returns a typed object requested, if present, from the appropriate layer in the binding stack.

returns.span: 要求的型別物件 (如果存在的話)，如果不存在則為 。

span.span: The typed object requested if it is present or if it is not present.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請用它從繫結程序項目堆疊擷取功能、需求和參數。Use this to retrieve capabilities, requirements and parameters from the binding element stack. 如果某個繫結項目支援傳回要求的物件，它就會傳回物件。If a binding element supports returning the requested object, it returns it. 如果不支援，則會將該呼叫向下委派到堆疊中的下一個繫結項目。If not, it delegates the call down to the next binding element in the stack. 如果到達堆疊的底部，而且沒有任何繫結項目支援要求的物件，則該方法會傳回 `null`。If it gets to the bottom of the stack and no binding element supported the requested object, then the method returns `null`. > [!NOTE] > 如果要加入必須加密的訊息標頭，您必須在要求 時從這個方法傳回符合您要求的 執行個體。If you are adding message headers that must be encrypted you must return a instance with your requirements from this method when asked for . ## Examples [!code-csharp[S_UEChannels#20](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CFX/s_uechannels/cs/servicesnippets.cs#20)]
